data.task: Fix OpenRouter retry logic so fatal auth errors do not retry and transient errors do.
data.agent_plan_summary: The OpenRouter retry logic needs to distinguish between fatal authentication errors (e.g., 401/403) and transient errors (e.g., 5xx, rate limits). Currently, the client likely retries all errors. The fix requires updating the OpenRouterClient to inspect HTTP status codes and only retry on transient ones.
